a.user_id as userId, a.address_id as addressId, a.product_id as productId, a.scale_id as scaleId, a.cycle, a.flag, a.start_time as startTime, a.end_time as endTime, a.belong_no as belongNo, a.create_time as createTime, a.update_time as updateTime, a.status
mapper.select: select a.id, , b.name as contactName, b.phone as contactPhone, b.email as contactEmail, c.address as address, c.area_id as areaId from ss_box_service a left join ss_user b on a.user_id = b.id left join ss_address c on a.address_id = c.id where a.id = #{id}
select product_id from ss_box_service where status NOT in(0) and user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into ss_box_service (user_id, address_id, product_id, scale_id, cycle, flag, start_time, end_time, belong_no, create_time, update_time) values (#{userId}, #{addressId}, #{productId}, #{scaleId}, #{cycle}, #{flag}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{belongNo}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update ss_box_service set user_id = #{userId}, address_id = #{addressId}, product_id = #{productId}, scale_id = #{scaleId}, cycle = #{cycle}, flag = #{flag}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, belong_no = #{belongNo}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_time = #{updateTime}, status = #{status} where id = #{id}
